# init(_:)

**Initializer**

Creates a value-type attributed string from a reference type.

## Declaration

```swift
init(_ nsStr: NSAttributedString)
```

## Parameters

- **nsStr**: The [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSAttributedString] to convert.

## Discussion

This initializer includes all attribute scopes defined by the SDK, such as [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/AttributeScopes/FoundationAttributes], [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/AttributeScopes/SwiftUIAttributes], and [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/AttributeScopes/AccessibilityAttributes]. To use third-party attribute scopes, use the initializers [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/AttributedString/init(_:including:)-9no47] or [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/AttributedString/init(_:including:)-puv0].

## Creating an Attributed String from a Reference Type

- **init(_:including:)**: Creates a value-type attributed string from a reference type, including an attribute scope.
- **init(_:including:)**: Creates a value-type attributed string from a reference type, including an attribute scope that a key path identifies.
